name: Temple Ops
description: Temples Ops is an online multiplayer First Person Shooter (FPS) game. 3 different game modes: Free for All, Team Death Match, and Capture the Flag. Additionally, there are 4 player classes that you can modify to your taste and 6 different kinds of weapons: Rifle, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenade, and Knife. Especially it has two maps based on India.
